timeline.message:
NF: Remove unused string: CardEditorLaterMessage

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string: sdcard_missing_message

Related 7571

NF: Remove studyoptions_welcome_title

String was unused

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string: card_editor_copy_card

Replaced with "Copy Note"

Related 7571

NF: Remove V2 import strings

import_cannot_with_v2
import_needs_v2

Removed in 7fe4f6725eb908e4993f4628b1a61f88c12ad617

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused strings for Intent Add

Removed in a Note Editor Change a long time ago

intent_add_saved_information and
intent_add_clear_all

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused strings for Login

We no longer handle sign-up, done via AnkiWeb

terms_and_conditions
username_repeat
password_repeat

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused Card Browser toggle values

card_browser_toggle_suspend_card
card_browser_toggle_mark_card
card_browser_suspended_cards

We no longer need (un)suspend - we show the correct value

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string deleting notes

delete_card_message
delete_cards_title
delete_card_mult_message

We now allow undo, so we don't show a confirmation

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string for search

card_browser_filtering_cards

We now show the results as we process them - no wait dialog

Related 7571

NF: Remove "backup_delete"

We no longer allow deletion of backups

Related 7571

NF: Remove Language Hint String

Remove: model_field_editor_language_hint_dialog_title

Replaced by locale_selection_dialog_title

Related 7571

NF: Remove Unused Field Options String

model_field_editor_options

Appears to have never been used

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string: "add"

Better with the following?
deck_conf_add
or menu_add

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string: "col_load_failed"

We now have a dialog for this case with recovery options

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string - custom study rebuild

rebuild_custom_study_deck

I don't think we use a progress dialog here any more

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused string: "changelog_url"

We now have an in-app changelog

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused duplicate help string

link_ankidroid_support

We use link_help (and AnkiDroidApp.getFeedbackUrl for translations)

Related 7571

NF: Remove unused config: ga_sessionTimeout

Related 7571

NF: Ignore dont translate file from being unused

Related 7571

NF: Ignore translated files for 'UnusedResources'

Related 7571

Enable lint: UnusedResources

Fixes 7571

timeline.author: mikehardy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,6 +29,10 @@
         <!-- Ignore as they'll be used for #7526 -->
         <ignore regexp="content_picture\.png|device_access_mic\.png" />
         <ignore path="res/values/12-dont-translate.xml" />
+        <!-- Ignore all translations except values - CrowdIn will handle deletions -->
+        <!-- We only need to handle -af and all others are implicitly ignored -->
+        <!-- tested and this does not block a string in /values/ from triggering lint -->
+        <ignore path="res/values-af/" />
